messages.message: :alarm: Instabase Production Cluster CA Certificates expire in approx. 12 hours. We will be performing emergency certificate rotation at 6 AM CT(in next 15 mins). Please save your work. There might be small disruption to the environment.
All nodes are updated to use new CA Certificates. No more downtime expected. All systems should be back to normal.

CA Certs for Production are updated.
_You must update all API clients outside the cluster (such as `kubectl` on developer machines) to use the new credentials and point to the new IP address of the control plane._
https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine/docs/how-to/credential-rotation
